html:
• Amazon.com Inc AMZN.OQ reported quarterly adjusted earnings of $5.80​​ per share for the quarter ended in December. The mean expectation of forty three analysts for the quarter was for earnings of $3.57 per share.

  • Revenue rose 9.4% to $137.41 billion from a year ago; analysts expected $137.55 billion.

  • Amazon.com Inc's reported EPS for the quarter was $27.75​.

  • The mean earnings estimate of analysts had fallen by about 2% in the last three months.​

  • In the last 30 days eleven analysts negatively revised earnings estimates

  • Amazon.com Inc shares had fallen by 9.7% this quarter.

  • The company reported quarterly net income of $14.32 billion.

  • Wall Street's median 12-month price target for Amazon.com Inc is $4,025.00

  • The current average analyst rating on the shares is "buy" and the breakdown of recommendations is 54 "strong buy" or "buy," 1 "hold" and no "sell" or "strong sell."

This summary was machine generated February 3 at 10:42 p.m. ​All figures in US dollars unless otherwise stated.
